responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning solutions to enhance customer personalization, optimize monetization models, and improve lead quality.

Actively partner with Product, Engineering, Business Intelligence, and other teams to integrate ML models into initiatives across various verticals.
Identify and prioritize high-impact ML opportunities, leading their design, implementation, and deployment.
Serve as a thought leader by mentoring junior data scientists and contributing to the growth of the data science team.
Create containerized ML models using Docker/Kubernetes to ensure efficiency, scalability, and ease of deployment.
analysis: The job responsibilities include building scalable ML solutions and creating containerized ML models using Docker/Kubernetes. These tasks require designing and implementing software architecture to ensure scalability, efficiency, and integration with other systems. Therefore, this activity is relevant as it aligns with the need to define system components, data flows, and integration points.
